fr.upmc.colins.farm3.admission

Class AdmissionControl

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.upmc.components.AbstractComponent
      • fr.upmc.colins.farm3.admission.AdmissionControl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    fr.upmc.components.ComponentI

    public class AdmissionControl
extends fr.upmc.components.AbstractComponent
    The class AdmissionControl implements a component that simulate an admission control.

    Description

    An admission control take care of serving application upload from a consumer's JVM (eg. from the request generator). When uploading an application the admission control allocate a predefined number of virtual machines and a dedicated request dispatcher. The admission control then return the uri of the request dispatcher.

    Created on : december 2014

    Version:
    $Name$ -- $Revision$ -- $Date$
    Author:
    Colins-Alasca
